abstract: Citadel Investment Group has decided to continue suspending redemptions from its two largest funds for another quarter after freezing them last year, but will institute a new program to allow withdrawals.
snippet: Citadel Investment Group has decided to continue suspending redemptions from its two largest funds for another quarter after freezing them last year, but will institute a new program to allow withdrawals.
lead_paragraph: Investors in Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group have received another round of sour news, coupled with a glimmer of hope. Mr. Griffin has decided to continue suspending redemptions from his two largest funds for another quarter after freezing them last year, but will institute a new program to allow withdrawals.

headline.main: Citadel Keeps Gates Up, but Sets Redemption Plan
